cyber-dojo.sh:
rm -f *.class
CLASSES=.:`ls /cucumber/*.jar | tr '\n' ':'`
javac -Xlint:unchecked -cp $CLASSES  *.java
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  java -cp $CLASSES org.junit.runner.JUnitCore `ls -1 *Test*.class | grep -v '\\$' | sed 's/\(.*\)\..*/\1/'`
fi
hear_shout.feature:
Feature: Hearing a shout

    Shouts have a range of approximately 1000 metres

    Scenario: Shouter should not hear their own shout
        Given Lucy has an account
        When Lucy shouts
        Then Lucy should not hear Lucy

    Scenario Outline: Only in range shout is heard
        Given Lucy is at 0, 0
        And Sean is at <SeansLoc>
        When Sean shouts
        Then Lucy should hear <WatLucyHears>

        Examples: In-range
          | SeansLoc | WatLucyHears |
          | 0, 900   | Sean         |
          | 0, 800   | Sean         |
          | 0, 300   | Sean         |

        Examples: Out of-range
          | SeansLoc  | WatLucyHears |
          | 900, 800  | no shouts    |
          | 800, 900  | no shouts    |
          | 800, 1100 | no shouts    |

    Scenario: Multiple shouters
        Given people are located at
          | name  |    x |   y |
          | Sean  |    0 |   0 |
          | Oscar |    0 | 500 |
          | Lucy  | 1100 |   0 |
        When Sean shouts
        And Oscar shouts
        Then Lucy should not hear Oscar
        But Lucy should hear Sean
